Dr Griff Walker

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Raleway||||” text_font_size=”18″ text_line_height=”32px” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”45px|||” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”14″ text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”25px” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Dr Griff Walker is a specialist Gastroenterologist practicing on the Gold Coast, Queensland.  Dr Walker consults at the Gold Coast Private Hospital in Southport. Dr Walker is a Visiting Medical Officer at the Gold Coast Private Hospital in Southport and Pindara Private Hospital at Benowa. Dr Walker is fully accredited with the Gastroenterology Society of Australia (GESA) and is a Fellow of the Royal Australasian College of Physicians (RACP).

excerpt.rendered:
• WELCOME
Dr Griff Walker Dr Griff Walker is a specialist Gastroenterologist practicing on the Gold Coast, Queensland.  Dr Walker consults at the Gold Coast Private Hospital in Southport. Dr Walker is a Visiting Medical Officer at the Gold Coast Private Hospital in Southport and Pindara Private Hospital at Benowa. Dr Walker is fully accredited with […]
